name: ULTRA REAL GLASS BRIDGE TOURNAMENT ALPHA
name_original: ULTRA REAL GLASS BRIDGE TOURNAMENT ALPHA
description:
https://www.ultrafungames.com/

We are Ultra Fun Games, an indie gaming studio, specializing in VR games for Oculus Quest. Founded by Max Tudor (Beast Max) in 2018, Ultra Fun Games develops, publishes and distributes a growing portfolio of quality VR, 3D and 2D games and apps that offer a powerful and full-featured gaming experience, and some offer a great physical and mental workout too!
